GK16visa03cu:7: atha--kāvyasvarūpanirūpaṇānantaraṃ koyaṃ raso yadātmakaṃ vākyaṃ kāvyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:20: tathāpi yatra śloke militā na santi tatraikenānyavyañjane vyabhicāriṇāmanyāpekṣayā śīghravyañjakatvabhityetaddvārā rasasyāpi śīghrapratipādakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:28: tataśca bhāvanopanītaḥ sa ratyādirvibhāvādiniṣṭhena svādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādyabhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatayā tathā pariṇamatīti
GK16visa03cu:37: yadyapīha milito ratyādiḥ prapānakarasanyāyena carvyamāṇo 'khaṇḍasvarūpo rasaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:52: ānīya nītaḥ svādyatvaṃ sthāyibhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:64: vyakto dadhyādinyāyena rūpāntarapariṇato vyaktīkṛta eva raso na tu dīpena ghaṭa iva pūrvasiddho vyajyate /
GK16visa03cu:69: tannyāyena rāmādiratyādireva vibhāvādiniṣṭhakhādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādau abhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatmakajñānarūpatayā pariṇamatītyarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:72: natu atādṛgavastha iti pratipādayan punarāha---vyakto vyaktīkṛta eveti /
GK16visa03cu:73: idaṃ ca vyaktīkṛtarasāsvādākhyena vyāpāreṇa vibhāvādiniṣṭhena vyañjanābhinnavyāpārāntareṇa
GK16visa03cu:76: (lo, u) dadhyādīti---yathā dugdhaṃ dadhirūpeṇa pariṇamate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:79: “rasāḥ pratīyanta iti tvodanaṃ pacatītivad vyavahāraḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:89: (lo, ū) odanaṃ pacatītivat--na khalvodanaḥ pūrvasiddho vyajyate,
GK16visa03cu:90: kintu pakvaḥ san odano bhavatīti tathāyamapi vyaktaḥ san raso bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:92: atra ca ratyādipadopādānādeva prāpte sathāyitve punaḥ sthāyipadopādānaṃ ratyādīnāmapi rasāntaraṣvasthāyitvapratipādanārtham /
GK16visa03cu:98: (vi, cha) rasatāmeti ratyādiḥ sthāyībhāvaḥ sacetasām“iti yaduktaṃ tatra sthāyītyasya upādānaphalamāha--atra ratyādīti /
GK16visa03cu:103: paraṃ kevalaṃ tādṛśo hāsakrodhādibhāvaḥ sthāyitāṃ pratipadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:114: (vi, ja) sattvodrekāditi kārikārthaṃ pratipadaṃ svayameva vyākhyāsyati /
GK16visa03cu:116: svākāravadabhinnatveneti---ayaṃ ratyādijñānarūpo rasaḥ pariṇāmavaśādratyādyabhinnatvena viśiṣṭa āsvādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:118: āropyamāṇarāmādiratyādyabhedana adhikaraṇībhūtasāmājikaratyādereva yaḥ svaprakāśa āsvādaḥ tasyeva rasatvāt tatra cābhinnatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:120: svākāravāde hi viṣayo jñānābhinno jñānasyākāra eveti /
GK16visa03cu:122: (lo, ṝ) samprati kīdṛgasāvāsādyate yenaitadāsvādanalampaṭaḥ kāvye pravartiṣyate lokaḥ ityāśaṅkyoktāṃ sattvodrekāditi kārikāmavatārayati--asyeti
GK16visa03cu:131: “rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ satvamihocyate” ityuktaprakāro bāhyameyavimukhatāpādakaḥ kaścanāntaro dharmaḥ sattvam /
GK16visa03cu:134: akhaṇḍa ityeka evāyaṃ vibhāvādiratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārātmakaḥ atra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:144: ayamāśayaḥ-“sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
GK16visa03cu:146: ityādi bhagavadvacanāt triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya prakāśe sukhetpattiḥ sattvāṃśasya prakāśaśca rajastamasorabhibhavād vaiṣayikaṃ sukhaṃ janayati /
GK16visa03cu:147: tathā hi sattvāṃśaprakāśatāratamyād vaiṣayikasukhasyāpi tāratamyaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:149: tacca sukhakāraṇaṃ yadi sakalalaukikasukhakāraṇottaraṃ tena rajastamasorabhibhavaḥ sarvathā śakyakriya eveti /
GK16visa03cu:150: tato nyāyāt lokottarakāvyārthaśravaṇarūpakāraṇāt sarvathā rajastamasyabhibhūya manasaḥ sattvāṃśasyaiva prakāśastadā tanmātrahetuko 'khaṇḍaprakāśarūpa ātmāvabodhaḥ pramāṇika eva /
GK16visa03cu:153: sa cātmānandād bodho yadi“anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nirasya prāṇato yataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:155: śāstrānayanahetukaḥ syāt tadā nirupahitaṃ brahma prakāśate /
GK16visa03cu:158: kāraṇavecitryasyaivāyaṃ sahṛdayānubhavasiddho 'nubhāva iti tasya ca ratyādyaṃśaśavalatve 'pi yathā svaprakāśatamoviruddhaṃ tathehagre darśayiṣyate
GK16visa03cu:174: vibhāvādiśca ratyādiśca tadviṣayaṃ yat svaprakāśarūpaṃ sukhaṃ tatsahitaḥ camatkāra ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:176: tādṛśasukhacamatkārayorekadā sthitau tatra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ “vyāpārosti vibhāvādeḥ“ityādinā /
GK16visa03cu:177: vibhāvādeḥ svādanākhyavyāpārasya camatkārahetutāyāḥ sāmājikānāṃ rāmādināyakābhedāropahetutāyāśca vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:178: cinmaya itīti---svaprakāśānanda eva cid jñānaṃ tat svarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:181: cittasya vistāraḥ ātmasaṃyogaviśeṣeṇa janitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānam /
GK16visa03cu:192: (vi, ña) rase sāra iti rasāsvādahetutvāt sāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:194: camatkārasya vismayarūpatvāt tena svaprakāśasukhe 'tiśayakaraṇāt tasya sāratvaṃ vilakṣaṇasukhātmakarasajanakatvam /
GK16visa03cu:195: tasmin sati śṛṅgārādirasakāvyeṣvapi adbhuto rasaḥ sambhavati /
GK16visa03cu:196: tathā ca sāmānyataḥ śṛṅgārādirase jāte 'dbhutamutpādya vilakṣaṇāsvādarūpaḥ prakṛṣṭaśṛṅgārādiraso janyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:197: kāvyaprakāśe tu āsvāda eva camatkāraḥ natu tadbhinno vismayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:222: yathā yoginaḥ śuddhaṃ brahma svaprakāśānandacidrūpatayā sākṣātkurvanti ratyādyaṃśakarburitamapi tathā puṇyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:230: ācāryāstu śavalitasyaivānubhavāt sukhamanubhavāmīti pratisandhānasya ca tāvatavopapatteradhikaṃ necchanti /
GK16visa03cu:239: vastutastu saṃbhedāditi lyab--garbhatvāt pañcamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita iti /
GK16visa03cu:240: ātmānandeti---ātmani ya ānandastadrūpeṇa samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:244: tatsambhedāditi lyablope paccamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:246: tathāpi “rasaḥ svādyate” iti kālpanikaṃ bhedamurarī kṛtya karmakarttari vā prayogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:250: karmakartari veti--“bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayameva“ityatra ekasyaiva kuśūlasya karmatvakarttṛtvobhayavivakṣayā
GK16visa03cu:251: bhedāropavadatrāpi āsvādyāsvādanayorabhedepi bhedavivakṣayā karmakartari prayogaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:256: taduktam-“rasyamānatāmātrasāratvāt prakāśaśarīrādananya eva hi rasaḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:281: (vi, ta) nanu vibhāvādijanyena vyañjanādhīnajñānenaiva viṣayīkaraṇāt svabhinnajñānagrāhyatvamastyevetyāśaṅkāyāmāha--aṅkāyāmāha---vyañjanāyāśca jñānaviśeṣatvāditi /
GK16visa03cu:289: ghaṭādervyañjako yathā dīpo vibhāvādestathātvābhāvād ghaṭavyañjakadīpato vibhāvādeḥ pārthakyaṃ pṛthagbhāvo vailakṣaṇyamiti samudāyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:291: svaviṣayajñānena svajanyajñānena vā ghaṭadhiyo hetordepasya ghaṭavyañjakabhāvaprasaktyā “yathā dīpa';
GK16visa03cu:296: tathā ca svajanyajñānābhinnāyā anyasya jñānadanyasya dhiyo heturyaḥ sa eva siddhe
GK16visa03cu:297: jñānaṃ vināpi siddhe arthe vyañjako mato yathā dīpa ityarthaḥ vibhāvādistu svajanyavyañjanādhīnajñānabhinnasyā'svādātmakarasāderjanaka
GK16visa03cu:299: anyathābhāve anyathātve svajanyaṃ pratyapi svasvavyañjakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:300: asya vibhāvādeḥ kārakāt ko viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:301: ghaṭapratīpavat dvau yau vyaṅgyavyañjakau tayoḥ sakāśādanayoḥ rasavibhāvādyoḥ pārthakyaṃ vailakṣaṇyamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:302: na tu vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ parasparaṃ pārthakyaṃ bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:313: (vi, tha) vyañjanāsvādayorāśaṅkitamaikyaṃ nirasya rasāvasthasya vyaṅgyatvābhāvaṃ siddhāntayan āha---“cet satyamiti” /
GK16visa03cu:316: siddhe natu sādhye vyañjako mataḥ śabda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:322: ityuktadiśā ghaṭapradīpavadvyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyameveti kathaṃ rasasya vyaṅgyateti cet,
GK16visa03cu:326: (lo, ī) uktadiśā dhvanikārādyuktamārgeṇa vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyamityanena vyañjanāyā vyaṅgyasya ca pārthakyaṃ nyāyasiddhameva iti bhāvaḥ
GK16visa03cu:338: tathā ca tad viṣaya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:339: vyañjanādhīnajñānaṃ tu ratyadiviṣayaḥ tato bhinnameva ityato rasavyañjanādhīnajñānayornaikyamityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:343: nanu kathaṃ tarhi raso vyaṅgya ityucyate ityata āha---abhidhādīti /
GK16visa03cu:344: vilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyañjanā raso vyaṅgya iti vyahgyarāmādiratyādyāropādhikaraṇasāmājikaratyādeḥ rasarūpatayā pariṇāmāt paramparayā vyaṅgya ityarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:348: ata eva-yato jñānarūpa eva rasa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:357: ata eva hi rasanāsvādanacamatkaraṇādayo vilakṣaṇā eva vyapadeśāḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:364: nanu tarhi karuṇādīnāṃ rasānāṃ duḥ khayatvādrasatvaṃ (tadunmukhatvaṃ )
GK16visa03cu:374: (vi, na) rase iti--karuṇādau rasa grāhye karuṇādirasasvarūpameva yat sukhaṃ jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:378: sāmājikānāṃ tu sukhameva jāyata ityatra sacetasāmanubhavaḥ pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:390: (vi, pa) asahṛdayānāmapi paraduḥ khajñānādapi duḥ khameva jāyate ityevaṃhṛdayānāmapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:392: kiñca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāttadunmukhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:393: nahi kaścat sacetā ātmano duḥkhāya pravarttate /
GK16visa03cu:407: duḥkhahetutva-prasaṅga iti--tathā ca tat--śravaṇe na kopi pravartate /
GK16visa03cu:415: (vi, bha) duḥ khahetubhya iti---paraśokādayaḥ svaduḥ khahetava eva,
GK16visa03cu:419: śokaharṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visa03cu:423: paraśokādikāraṇebhyo laukikāḥ śokaharṣādayo jāyantāṃ nāmeti tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyena
GK16visa03cu:427: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visa03cu:437: ye khalu rāmavanavāsādayo loke “duḥkhāraṇāni” ityucyante ta eva hi kāvyanāṭyasamarpitā
GK16visa03cu:439: tebhyaśca surate dantadhātādibhya iva sukhameva jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:450: ataśca “laukikaśokaharṣādikāraṇobhyo laukikaśokaharṣādayo jāyante” iti loka eva pratiniyamaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:456: “sarvebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyaḥ sukhameva jāyate” iti niyamānna kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:457: kathaṃ tarhi hariścandrādicaritasya kāvyanāṭyayorapi darśanaśravaṇābhyāmaśrupātā dayo jāyanta ityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:466: tarhi kathaṃ kāvyataḥ sarveṣāmīdṛśī rasābhivyaktirna jāyata ityata āha--
GK16visa03cu:467: na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visa03cu:473: tatra yadyādyā na syāttadā śrotriyajaranmīmāṃsakādīnāmapi sa syāt /
GK16visa03cu:477: otriyeti--jaranmīmāṃsakā hi kāryakāraṇabhāvāditarkamātrānuśīlanān na kāvyarasāsvādavantaḥ tadanuśīlanācca tadānīntanavāsanāvanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:478: naca prāktanavāsanābhāvādeva teṣāṃ na kāvyarasāsvāda ityevamucyatām,
GK16visa03cu:480: teṣāmeva tarkānuśīlanatyāgena kāvyānuśīlanābhyāse rasodvodhena idānīntanyā api avaśyaṃvācyatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:482: yadi dvitīyā na syāttadā yadragiṇā mapi keṣāñcidrasodvodho na dṛśyate tanna syāt /
GK16visa03cu:488: natu tatra idānīntanatvādipraveśaḥ jaran mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu atyantatarkānurāga eva pratibandha ityevānvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:509: svīyaratyādau rāmādiratyādyabhedāroparūpasya ca sādhāraṇī sā iti kārikārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:512: yasya hanūmadādeḥ pāthodhiplavanādayaḥ āsan pramātā tadabhedena svātmānaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:515: bhedāgrahe satyena abhedagraha upapadyate ityata āha---tadabhedeneti /
GK16visa03cu:525: sabhyānāṃ rāmādyabhedapratipattau nāṭyakāvyayoḥ rāvaṇādidarśanaśravaṇābhyāṃ roṣodvodhena sabhātaḥ samutthāya dhanurākarṣaṇādirbhavat /
GK16visa03cu:526: bhedena pratipattau tu ātmaniṣṭaroṣādisthāyibhāvodvodho na syāt /
GK16visa03cu:527: evaṃ ca yo doṣaḥ samanantarameva darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:534: (vi, sa) itthaṃ svasmin hanumadādyābhedāropamuktvā tadutsāhajñānādeva svotsāhodvodhamupapādayitumāśaṅkate /
GK16visa03cu:544: (lo, i) sādhāraṇyābhimānataḥ--uktaprakāreṇa vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇīkaraṇavyāpāraprabhāvenotpannasya svātmani sādhāraṇyābhimānabalāt /
GK16visa03cu:573: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visa03cu:574: tadāsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visa03cu:580: evaṃ ca vibhāvādayaḥ svayaṃ sādhāraṇyena pratyāyayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:584: alaukikatvameteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visa03cu:595: asya yogārthasyānubhāvādāvapi sattveti paribhāṣāyā yogarūḍhatvānna tatra prayogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:602: evaṃbhūtasya āsvādāṅkuratāṃ prāpitasya ratyādeḥ svaniṣṭhasvādanākhyavyāpāreṇa rasarūpatayā praveśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:606: vibhāvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāraṇakāryyasahakāritve kathaṃ trayāṇāmapi rasodbodhe kāraṇatvamityucyate --
GK16visa03cu:612: rasodvodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇānyeva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visa03cu:613: nanu tarhi kathaṃ rasāsvāde teṣāmekaḥ pratibhāsa ityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:620: tataḥ sambalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sacetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visa03cu:628: nanu yadi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhirmmilitaireva rasastat kathaṃ teṣāmekasya dvayorvā sadbhāve 'pi sa syādityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:637: “dīrghākṣaṃ śaradindukāntivadanaṃ bāhū natāvaṃsayoḥ saṅkṣiptaṃ nibiḍonnatastanamuraḥ pārśve pramṛṣṭe iva /
GK16visa03cu:638: madhyaḥ pāṇimito nitambi jaghanaṃ pādāvudagrāṅgulī chando narttayituryathaiva manasaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ tathāsyā vapuḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:642: uttamanaṭīṃ nartuyiturmanaso yathaivacchanda icchā tathaivāsyā vapuḥ sṛṣṭam (vidhātrā)
GK16visa03cu:645: nibiḍau--anyonyasaṃsaktau unnatau ca stanau yatra tādṛśaṃ ca uruḥ /
GK16visa03cu:648: jaghanottarabhāgaḥ nitambaḥ praśastaḥ tad yuktaṃ jaghanam,
GK16visa03cu:654: sṛṣṭaṃ vidhātrā iti śeṣaḥ nartayitā nartakīṣu dīrghākṣatvādyabhinayena darśayituṃ śikṣayati,
GK16visa03cu:681: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca,
GK16visa03cu:693: (vi, ṭha) sa yadā kāvyārthabhāvakaḥ syāttadā sopi sāmājiko bhavedityāha---kiṃceti /
GK16visa03cu:697: yadi punarnaṭo 'pi kāvyārthabhāvanayā rāmādisvarūpatāmātmano darśayet tadā so 'pi sabhyamadhya eva gaṇyate /
GK16visa03cu:706: (vi, ḍa) yadyapyuktarītyā rasasya sākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvena bhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:707: savikalpakajñānaviṣayatvaṃ taj-jñānasya sākṣātkararūpatvaṃ ca tathāpi tasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ
GK16visa03cu:708: sādhayituṃ sākṣāt kriyamāṇghaṭādito 'pi vailakṣaṇyasādhanena kautukādasākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:723: (lo, a) nāyaṃ jñāpya iti--ayaṃ rasaḥ sattāyāṃ sadbhāve pratītimantareṇābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:726: yo hi jñāpyo ghaṭādiḥ sannapi kadācidajñāto bhavati,
GK16visa03cu:733: (vi, ḍha) hetuviśeṣakāryatvaṃ rasasya ye vadanti tanmataṃ nirasyati---yasmādeṣa ityādi tasmānna kārya ityantena /
GK16visa03cu:734: ayamarthaḥ ---“prapānakarasanyāyāccarvyamāṇo raso bhavedityuktyā vibhāvādiratyādisamūhālambanātmako rasa ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:736: kecittu tatsamakālotpannaṃ vyañjanayāpi tādṛśaṃ samūhālambanānantaraṃ jāyate,
GK16visa03cu:741: na samūhālambanakāryaḥ svasya svakāryatvāt svakālotpattikasya vyañjanādhīnasamūhālambanāntarasyābhāvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:744: (lo, a) rasasyeti--nahi vibhāvādijñānakāraṇakamityanantaraṃ tataścānupalabhyamānakāraṇāntarasya rasasya na kāryatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:746: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /
GK16visa03cu:753: “pratīyamānaḥ prathamaṃ pratyekaṃ heturucyate“ityanena pratyekasya hetutvoktyā tatkāryatve vipratipattyabhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:758: (vi, ta) nanu tādṛśsamūhātambanakāraṇatve ko doṣaḥ ityāha--tataśceti /
GK16visa03cu:766: (vi, tha) kāraṇajñānasya sthitiḥ kāryajñānasyotpattiriti tu na sambhavatyeva /
GK16visa03cu:788: evaṃ rasasya samūhālambanakāryatvameva khaṇḍitaṃ natu kāryatvam /
GK16visa03cu:794: nanu pūrvasaṃvedanābhāvānnityatvābhāve itaraṣāmapi nityavastūnāmabhāvaprasaṅga ityata āha-asamvetaneti /
GK16visa03cu:798: asaṃvedanakāle hi na bhāvo 'ṣyasya vidyate (ka) // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visa03cu:809: (lo, i) nāpi bhaviṣyannityāha--sākṣādanubhūyamānasya hi kathaṃ bhaviṣyattm /
GK16visa03cu:810: yasya khalu vastuno bhaviṣyattvaṃ sahajo dharmastat sadā bhaviṣyadeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:816: (vi, pa) nāpi bhaviṣyanniti yadyapi saṃvedanāt pūrvam asattvenaiva bhaviṣyatvaṃ durapahnavam /
GK16visa03cu:817: tathāpi bhaviṣyatpadārthāntarasya sākṣādānandamayaprakāśatvasvarūpābhāvāt tadvailakṣaṇyameva bhaviṣyatvābhāvaḥ kautukāduktaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:825: yadyapi ghaṭādisādhāraṇajñāpyatvasyaiva samūhālambanakāryatvasyaiva cābhāvaḥ prag darśitaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:832: tat pradhānatvāditi kvacit pāṭhe tatparāmarśaḥ pratyekaṃ taj jñānaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:840: tathā ca na nirvikalpakaṃ niṣprakārakajñānasyaiva tathātvāt /
GK16visa03cu:842: (lo, ī) nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam--asti hmālocanamātraprathamaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam,
GK16visa03cu:845: sa eva raso nirvikalpakajñānatvena gṛhyamāṇo na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:847: tatra pakṣe yasya grāhakatvamiṣyate ityatra nopacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:854: yadyapi tadgrāhakasya nirvikalpakatvābhāvayuktipradarśanenaiva savikalpakasaṃvedyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tathāpi savikalpakasaṃvedyāntarato vailakṣaṇyena tadavedyatvaṃ kautukāduktam /
GK16visa03cu:859: pratyuta tasya tatkāvyasya śabdavācyatve svaśabdavācyatvaṃ doṣa eva vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:863: savikalpakavedyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ tatkāvyasthaśabdenaiva vācyamiti tato vailakṣaṇyamiti vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:877: sākṣātkārānantaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanāya sākṣātkārarūpasyāpi tatprakāśasya sākṣātkāratvābhāvamapi kautukādāha--nāparokṣa iti /
GK16visa03cu:882: (lo, ṛ) tathābhilāpeti--atrāpi pūrvavat raso na savikalpakarūpa iti /
GK16visa03cu:888: ataḥ paramityatra idamānupūrvoktanirvikalpakaparāmarśaḥ śabdasaṃbhāvta śābdajñānam parokṣamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:890: pūrvaṃ na śruto na dṛṣṭaścoktasvarūpo nirūpaṇaprakāro yasya rasasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:896: (vi, ya) itthaṃ kiñcit vastutaḥ kiñcicca kautukād vailakṣaṇyamuktvā kīdṛśaṃ tādṛśavilakṣaṇaṃ vastu tat iti pṛcchati;
GK16visa03cu:911: tatkiṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ tasya sadbhāva ityāha--
GK16visa03cu:912: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visa03cu:920: evaṃ ca sahṛdayānubhava evātra pramāṇamiti paryavasyati /
GK16visa03cu:929: lakṣyavyaṅgyavastūnāṃ sambhedāt jñānāt ātmano rasasyānandarūpeṇa samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:932: nanu yadi raso na kāryastatkathaṃ mahaṣiṇā(ka)
GK16visa03cu:939: tatastadātmakasya rasasya tatsākṣātkārāṃśamātrajanyatvaṃ siddhāntayituṃ kautukoktamapi tasyākāryatvamuktvā āśaṅkate--nanu yadi raso na kārya iti /
GK16visa03cu:943: itthaṃ vibhāvāditaścarvaṇāyā niṣpattireva vāstavikaratyādyaṃśasya tato niṣpattirupacaritetyuktyā carvaṇāṃśasyāpi niṣpattirupacaritaiveti vaktumāha---yadyapīti
GK16visa03cu:946: tataśca ratyādirūparasābhinna eva carvaṇātmakaḥ sākṣātkārastathā ratyādeḥ vibhāvādyakāryatayaiva carvaṇasyāpi vibhāvādyakāryatvamarthasiddhamiti yadyapi ratyāderarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:948: tathāpi tasya kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate /
GK16visa03cu:954: kintu vibhāvādijñānettarameva niṣpannetyevaṃ kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate ityartha /
GK16visa03cu:955: nacaivamanyathāsiddhavibhāvādijñānottarabhāvitvena tatkāryatvaṃ carvaṇāyām avāstavameva tat kathamupacāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa03cu:959: (lo, e) yadyapītyādi---ayamarthaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa rasābhinne carvaṇe kādācitkatvād vastuni vyabhicāreṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvādevopacaryate
GK16visa03cu:960: tena carvaṇasyāparicitena kāryatvena tadabhinne rasepi kāryatvamupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:972: nanu yadi militā ratyādayo rasāstatkathamasya svaprakāśatvaṃ kathaṃ vākhaṇḍatvamityāha--
GK16visa03cu:993: tasya pratimānataḥ satsādṛśyāt ityādyaṃśopi svaprakāśa iti /
GK16visa03cu:994: nanu yadi caitanyasya sajñānatvena jaḍasya svaprakāśatā tadā pramātṛbhāvamāpannasyāntaḥ karaṇasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ syāditi cenmaivam /
GK16visa03cu:995: tatra hi triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭatvam /
GK16visa03cu:1001: yadi ratyādikaṃ prakāśaśarīrādatiriktaṃ syāttadaivāsya svaprakāśatvaṃ na sidhyate,
GK16visa03cu:1005: “yadyapi rasānanyatayā carvaṇāpi na kāryā tathāpi kādācitkatayā kāryatvamupakalpya tadekātmanyanādivāsanāpariṇatirūpe ratyādibhāve 'pi vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:1006: “sukhāditādātmyāḍgīkāre cāsmākī siddhāntaśayyāmadhiśayya divyaṃ varṣasahastraṃ pramodanidrāmupeyāḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:1007: “abhinno 'pi sa pramātrā vāsanopanītaratyāditādātmyena gocarīkṛtaḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:1013: tayā rasādirūpā pariṇatiryasya tādṛśarūpe ratyādibhāge vibhāvādikāryatvavyavahāraḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1014: dvitīya iti ceti paryantaṃ samvādavākyatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:1021: gecarīkṛta iti cidānandamayoyaṃ puruṣa iti vadupacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1025: ratyādayo hi prathamamekaikaśaḥ pratīyamānāḥ sarve 'pyekībhūtāḥ sphuranta eva rasatāmāpadyante /
GK16visa03cu:1036: vibhāvā ityādi kārikāyāṃ ratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārā akaṇṭhoktā api prakaraṇadavaseyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1043: brahmatattvavaditi---khaṇḍākhaṇaaḍanānāpadārthānām advaitabhāvānayā akhaṇḍasvarūpatvāt brahmatattvasya itica ityantaṃ samvādavākyam /
GK16visa03cu:1046: [text of comm. wanting in both printed ed. and Sansknet e-text/]
GK16visa03cu:1048: athaṃ ke te vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa ityapekṣāyāṃ vibhāvamāha--
GK16visa03cu:1053: ye hi loke rāmādigataratihāsādīnāmudvodhakāraṇāni sītādayasta eva kāvye nāṭye ca
GK16visa03cu:1060: natu pratītyarthaṃ kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa bhāvyantetatpratipādanasāmarthya eva tathātvaucityādityata āhaāsvādāṅkureti /
GK16visa03cu:1063: ato vibhāvā ucyante ityarthaḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvānāṃ tathātvakaraṇaṃ rāmādiratyādīnāṃ ca tatrāropāt bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:1066: asyā paribhāṣāyāyogārūḍhatvādetadyogārthasyānubhāvādau sattvepi na tatra prayoga iti prāgapyuktam /
GK16visa03cu:1073: (vi, ṅa) śabdopahiteti--tān prasiddhān kaṃsādīn śrīkṛṣṇādikrodhasya raudrarasasthāyibhāvasthālambanavibhāvān śabdopahitarūpān śabdopasthāpyāt pratyakṣāniva sāmājikā manyante /
GK16visa03cu:1079: (lo, ī) śabdeti---śabdopahitarūpān kāvyarūpaśabdopādhinā śravaṇāt tadvuddhiviṣayatāmāpannānāṃ sādhanatvena sotsāhādyudabodhe manyante sabhyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1088: atha yasya rasasya yo vibhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1116: (vi, ja) prathamaṃ caturbheda iti---paścāttu dhīrodāttādīnām api dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭatvādibhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1152: tatra teṣāṃ dhīrodāttādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭānukūlaśaṭhatvena ṣoḍaśaprakārā nāyakaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1153: eṣu tvanekamahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visa03cu:1165: ityantaḥ purasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyā vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1169: anekapatnīsambhogārhā iyaṃ rātririti tatkarmaniyuktasya rājñi nivedanam /
GK16visa03cu:1176: sarvāsu anurāgasāmyena kasyāpyupekṣānarhatvāt apratipattyā kartavyanirṇayābhāvena mūḍhamanaskatvena dvitrādidaṇḍasthitiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1186: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ tayā,
GK16visa03cu:1192: (vi, ḍha) śoṇaṃ vīkṣyeti---roṣāruṇamukhīṃ priyāṃ cumbituṃ gatasya tayā prahartumudyataṃ
GK16visa03cu:1193: pādaṃ dhṛtvā kiñcit kartumakṣamīkṛtāṃ rudatīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hasitavato nāyakasya sakhyau
GK16visa03cu:1208: kintvanye 'pi janā vadanti subhago 'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭaṃ nikṣipatīti viśvamiyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam //
GK16visa03cu:1211: (vi, ṇa) asmākaṃ sakhīti--paṣyau subhagāyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1213: kintu na kevalamahamanyepi janā vadanti asyāḥ patiranyato 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na nikṣipatīti /
GK16visa03cu:1215: mayi asūyayā madapekṣayā saubhāgyālpatvena vā duḥ sthitaṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16visa03cu:1228: yaḥ punarekasyāmeva nāyikāyāṃ baddhabhāvo dvayorapi nāyikayorbahirdarśitānurāgo 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ gūḍhaṃ vipriyamācarita sa śaṭhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1231: tadetatkvācakṣe ghṛtamadhumayatvadvahuvaco- viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi na sakhī me gaṇayati” //
GK16visa03cu:1234: (vi, ta) śaṭhānyasyā iti---nāyikāyā vipriyakāriṇaṃ nāyakaṃ bhartsayantyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1235: he śaṭha / mama sakhīm āśliṣyanneva tvaṃ yadanyasyā nāyikāyāḥ kāñcīmaṇiraṇitaśabdamākarṇya sahasā praśithilabhujagranthiḥ (vāhuveṣṭanaṃ)
GK16visa03cu:1237: ato me sakhī ghṛtamadhumayena miśritaghṛtamadhurūpeṇa tvadīyabahucāṭuvacoviṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi kartavyaṃ na gaṇayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1251: (vi, da) atha prasaṅgāditi---atra eṣāmityanena nāyakamātrasyaiva parāmarśo natu prakānta śṛṅgārīyāṣṭacatvāriṃśata eva /
GK16visa03cu:1252: ata eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyo darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1268: (vi, dha) dūrānuvartinīti vyācaṣṭe---tasyeti dūrānuvartini ityasya vyākhyā bahuvyāpinīti bahudeśavyāpyasādhye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1274: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
GK16visa03cu:1278: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visa03cu:1316: “mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane” iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam,
GK16visa03cu:1319: “nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ” ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1322: (vi, ma) svaṃ ceti--svaṃ rājā tasya rājñaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1324: atra svasyāpi sahāyatvena kathanāt pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1336: (vi, ya) mantriṇeti---lalito dhīralalitastādṛśo rājā mantriṇaivārthasādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:1341: “niścinto mṛduraniśaṃ kalāparo dhīralalitaḥ syāditi dhīralalitalakṣaṇe niścintetvainārthacintanasya mantrimātraniṣṭhatvasiddhestasya mantriṇaḥ sahāyatākathanaṃ gatārthamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1345: ayaṃ mantrī syādarthānāṃ cintāyāmiti sūtrasya parabhāgaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1352: kintu rājā kenārthacintanaṃ kuryādityapekṣāyāmeva kvacin mantriṇā kvacidātmanā,
GK16visa03cu:1364: so 'yamanūḍhābhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ityuktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
GK16visa03cu:1368: duṣkulatā aiśvaryaṃ ca tābhyāṃ saṃyuktopi madamūrkhatābhyāmabhimānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1375: naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairmanuṣyagaṇanābhāvādapāsya trapā- mantaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsādayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1376: paryantāśrayibhinijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ kubjā nīcatayaiva yānti śanakairātmekṣaṇāśaṅkinaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1379: (vi, la) naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairiti---rājño vājiśālāta āgatamekaṃ mahāvanaraṃ dṛṣṭvā antaḥ purasthanapuṃsakādīnāṃ bhītikriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:1381: nijasya nāmna iti kṛ vekṣepa iti dhātunā kirātapadasya sādhitatvāt svasya paryantaviśīrṇatvaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1383: kintu nīcatayaiva vānarakartṛke ātmakarmake īkṣaṇe aśaṅkinaḥ śaṅkārahitāḥ santaḥ śanakairyāntītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1421: suśliṣṭaṃ kurute kāryaṃ nisṛṣṭārthastu sa smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.48 //
GK16visa03cu:1432: yāvaditi prerakeṇa yāvada bhāṣitasya sandeśasa hāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1444: sattvajāḥ tadudbhavāḥ sattvavatāṃ nāyakānā guṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1448: nīye ghṛṇādhike spardhā yataḥ śobheti tāṃ viduḥ // VisSd_3.51 //
GK16visa03cu:1452: (vi, sa) yataḥ śobheti--yato balāt śobhālakṣaṇena anurāgitoktā /
GK16visa03cu:1462: prakṛtiṣu amātyeṣu madhye sarva eva ityacintayat kiṃ tat ityatrāha--ahameveti /
GK16visa03cu:1466: nimnagā nadyaḥ tāsāṃ sarvāsāmevodadhinā jalagrahaṇena kṛtādaratvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1471: (vi, ka) dhīreti---vilāse sāttvike guṇe sati dhīretyādikaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1475: kaumārake 'pi girivadgurutāṃ dadhāno vīro rasaḥ kimayametyuta darpa eva //
GK16visa03cu:1479: tṛṇīkṛto jagattrayasya sattvānāṃ balānāṃ sāraḥ prakṛṣṭo bhāgo yathā /
GK16visa03cu:1487: (vi, ga) ūhyamudāharaṇamiti--- “tyajato maṅgalakṣaume cīre ca pratigṛhṇataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1490: atra hi maṅgalakṣaume gṛhṇataḥ cīre pratīlakṣīkṛtya tyajataśca rāmasya mukharāgaṃ
GK16visa03cu:1491: vismitā janāḥ samānaṃ dadṛśuḥ ityanena vanavāsārthaṃ cīragrahaṇasaṃkṣobhepi maṅgalakṣaumagrahaṇavad anudvegaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1497: atra bhayaśokayoḥ praveśāt mādhuryataḥ kiyān bhedaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1501: ātmapakṣaparipūrite jaga- tyasya nityasukhinaḥ kuto bhayam //
GK16visa03cu:1503: iyaṃ hi tapasyataḥ parameśvareṇa bhīṣitasya kasyaciduktiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1506: ātmapakṣeṇa bhavatā paripūrite jagati asya kuto bhayamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1507: yathā vā“na khalvanirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān“iti indreṇa bhīṣitasya raghoruktiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1514: ātmeśvarāṇāṃ na hi jātu vighnāḥ samādhibhedaprabhavo bhavanti //

GK16visa03cu:2298: sāpi viṭapī ayaṃ ca viṭapa iti sādṛśyam /
GK16visa03cu:2300: (lo, au) na khalviti--pibati sarvato niruddhaprasarīkṛtya svāmatrāyattatāyāṃ praveśayati upabhuṅktevā /
GK16visa03cu:2305: evañcānayorviṭapatvena sadṛśayorviṭapayuvayorvā garhitatvena sadṛśayorvā ucito yogo yataḥ tasyaiva viṭapapradānena bhavatīti ubhayathā sambandhaḥ
GK16visa03cu:2311: (vi, tha) tava kitaveti---vṛkṣapallavaṃ karṇapūraṃ dadānaṃ nāyakaṃ prati kopanāyāḥ nāyikāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2313: āhataiḥ dattaiḥ kṣitiruhāṇāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ pallavarūpaiḥ karṇapūraiḥ mama kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2314: nanu bhoḥ janaviditaiḥ bhavadvyalīkaiḥ bhavadapakarmabhiḥ mama karṇayugmaṃ ciraparipūritameva /
GK16visa03cu:2315: tathā ca yogārthavaśāt bhavadvyalīkameva me karṇapūra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2324: (vi, da) iti gaditeti---pūrvarṇitanāyikāto 'nyā nāyikā iti gaditavatī satī ruṣā amburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca taṃ nāyakaṃ jaghāna /
GK16visa03cu:2325: kaṣayitacakṣuṣā darśanameva hananam amburuhacakṣuṣordvayoḥ viśeṣaṇamāha---sphuriteti---sphuritaṃ manoharaṃ pakṣmaiva keśaravat yasya tādṛśena cakṣuṣā /
GK16visa03cu:2327: tathā śravaṇaparyantaniyamitena cakṣuṣā śravaṇe niyamitena amburuheṇa ubhayatra sthāpanameva niyamanam /
GK16visa03cu:2329: iyaṃ hi vakroktyā paruṣavacanena karṇotpalatāḍanena ca dhīramadhyatādhīramadhyatādhīrapragalbhatābhiḥ saṃkīrṇā /
GK16visa03cu:2345: śobhā kāntiśca dīptiśca mādhuryaṃ ca pragalbhatā /
GK16visa03cu:2348: moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vibhramo lalitaṃ madaḥ // VisSd_3.91 //
GK16visa03cu:2352: pūrve bhāvādayo dhairyāntā daśa nāyakānāmapi saṃbhavanti /
GK16visa03cu:2353: kiṃtu sarve 'pyamī nāyikāśritā eva vicchittiviśeṣaṃ puṣṇānti /
GK16visa03cu:2359: atra bhāvādyāstrayaḥ śobhādyāḥ sapta līlādyā aṣṭādaśa iti aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2367: janmataḥ prabhṛti nirvikāre manasi udbuddhamātro vikāro bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2369: “sa eva surabhiḥ kālaḥ sa eva malayānilaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2379: (vi, na) vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpīti--tapasyato maheśasya samīpe kāmena dhanuṣi āropite pārvalā hāvavarṇanamidam,
GK16visa03cu:2382: bālakadambapuṣpatulyatām aṅgānāṃ pulakena mukhena sācīkṛtā vakrīkṛtā;
GK16visa03cu:2385: (lo, ī) vivṛṇvatīti atna hāve 'pi bhāvaviśeṣatvāt bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ mukhena sācīkṛtā na saṃmukhībhūtetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2392: “taha te jhatti pauttā vahue savvaṅgavibbhamā saalā /
GK16visa03cu:2393: saṃsai amuddhabhāvā hoi ciraṃ jai sahīṇaṃ pi” //
GK16visa03cu:2396: (vi, pa) tathā tasyā jhaṭiti pravṛttā vadhvāḥ sarvāṅgavibhramāḥ sakalāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2407: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa03cu:2411: asambhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamiti--sā pārvatī atha anantaraṃ bālyāt paraṃ vayaḥ yauvanaṃ prapede /
GK16visa03cu:2412: vayasi rūpakāṇyāha--asambhṛtam iti haritālādi saṃbhārajanitam aṅgayaṣṭermaṇḍanam /
GK16visa03cu:2414: anāsavākhyam āsavasya madirāyā yā ākhyā saṃjñā tadrahitamāsavabhinnamitiyāvat /
GK16visa03cu:2415: puṣpabhinnaṃ kāmasya astram aṅgabhūṣaṇam aṅgaśobhā asambhṛtamaṇḍanamiti /
GK16visa03cu:2444: “sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśolarlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti /
GK16visa03cu:2445: iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimi hi madhuraṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām” //
GK16visa03cu:2462: “na brūte paruṣāṃ giraṃ vitanute na bhrayugaṃ bhaṅgaraṃ,
GK16visa03cu:2463: nottaṃsaṃ kṣipati kṣitau śravaṇataḥ sā me sphuṭe 'pyāgasi /
GK16visa03cu:2464: kāntā garbhagṛhe gāvākṣavivaravyāpāritākṣyā bahīḥ sakhyā vaktramabhiprayacchati paraṃ paryaśruṇī locane” //
GK16visa03cu:2469: me mama sphuṭe 'pyāgasi aparādhe s kāntā sakhyā vaktramabhi sakhyā vaktre paryyaśruṇī locane prayacchati /
GK16visa03cu:2470: sakhyāḥ kīdṛśayāḥ sāgasaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ gavākṣavivaravyāpāritākṣyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2471: mantu paruṣaṃ ruṣā na brūte ityādi spaṣṭam /
GK16visa03cu:2479: mama tu dayitaḥ ślāghyastāto jananyamalānvayā kulamamalinaṃ na tvevāyaṃ jano na ca jīvitam” //
GK16visa03cu:2482: (vi, ra) muktātmaślāghaneti---acañcalā manovṛttiryā muktātmaślāghanā sā dhairyyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2483: jvalatu iti gaurikāvivāhe udvejamānāyāstatra saṃmitāyāḥ mālatyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2484: mama virahoddīpanāya rātrau akhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī jvalatu /
GK16visa03cu:2486: mṛtyoḥ pareṇa karmaṇā kiṃvā tena vidhāsyate /
GK16visa03cu:2488: tathāpi pitṛmātṛkulakalaṅkaṃ na janayiṣyāmi ityabhiprāyeṇāha---mama tviti /
GK16visa03cu:2489: atastu mayi mama dayitaḥ drayāyogyo yataḥ khlāghyaḥ niṣkalaṅkaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2492: natvevāyaṃ jano mādhavaḥ dayito jīvitañca na dayitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2505: veṇībandhātmakakapardinī pārvatī sarpavalayasya jaṭāvato harasyānukāriṇī jagat pātvityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2519: atrāntara iti---vakulavīthyām upaviṣṭaṃ mādhavaṃ vilokya gajena yāntyā mālatyā harṣakriyāṃ makarande kathayataḥ mādhavasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2526: manmathadevārādhanena yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaviśeṣamadhigatavatī taṃ taṃ tatra prakāśitavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2532: vāsastu pratanu viviktamastvitīyānākalpo yadi kusumeṣuṇā na śūnyaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2537: svacchāmbha iti--vilāsinīnāmākalpo veśaḥ kusumeṣuṇā yadi na śūnyaḥ tadā iyānapyastu /
GK16visa03cu:2538: sa ka ityatrāha--svaccheti--svacchāmbhasi snapanena vidhautaṃ vikṣālitamaṅgam /
GK16visa03cu:2548: atyantābhimate 'pi vastuni vidhiryāsāṃ niṣedhātmaka- stāstrailokyavilakṣaṇaprakṛtayo vāmāḥ prasidantu te” //
GK16visa03cu:2551: (vi, ṣa) yāsāmiti---satyapi bhāve vāmācaraṇaśīlāsu nāyikāsu anurāgiṇaḥ kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2553: tacca garvāt cāṭuṃ kārayituṃ priyeparaṃ kevalaṃ prāṇān arpayantīti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2557: (lo, ū) atyantābhimate iti--niṣadhātmako vidhiḥ kimanenāsmākam ityādyanādarayuktamevābhimatavastunaḥ aparigraha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2564: kāminaḥ sma kurute karabhorurhāri śuṣkaruditaṃ ca sukhe 'pi” //
GK16visa03cu:2568: karabhorūḥ kāminaḥ pāṇirodhādikamavirodhitetyādi viśiṣṭaṃ yathā syāt tathā kurute sma /
GK16visa03cu:2580: vallabhasya kathādiṣu prasaṅgeṣu kenāpyārabhyamāṇeṣu tadbhāvabhāvite tadanurāganiṣovite citte sati karṇakaṇaaḍūyanādikaṃ moṭṭāyitamiti prāhuḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2587: āhuḥ kuṭṭamitaṃ nāma śiraḥ karavidhūnanam // VisSd_3.103 //
GK16visa03cu:2593: (vi, kṣa) pallavopamiti iti---abhīṣṭe priye 'dharabimbaṃ daṣṭavati sati arthāt niṣedhārthaṃ dhūyamānena kareṇa paryyakūjītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2606: asthāne vibhramādīnāṃ vinyāso vibhramo mataḥ // VisSd_3.104 //
GK16visa03cu:2614: (vi, ka) sukumāratayeti---aṅgānāṃ vinyāso vilakṣaṇanyāsaḥ sukumāratayā komalatayā /
GK16visa03cu:2630: “mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti /
GK16visa03cu:2631: anyāpi kiṃ na khalu bhājanamīdṛśīnāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2636: mā garvamiti--anyanāyikāyāḥ patisaubhagyādhīnagarvaṃ sūcayantyāḥ tatsakhyāḥ tat sapatnyāmuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2637: he sākhi / mama kapolatale kāntasvahastalikhitā mañjarī puṣpakalikā cakāsti śobhate iti garva mā udvahaṃ /
GK16visa03cu:2639: anyā tava sapatnī mama sakhī kiṃ kapole tanna likhatītyatrāha /
GK16visa03cu:2640: vairīti--vepathuratra mañjarīlikhanādhikāraṇamalābho nāyikāyā eva patyurbhāvātiśayadarśanena bhāvodayāt--natu lekhakasya patyuḥ pāṇeḥ,
GK16visa03cu:2649: “dūrāgatena kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭā novāca sā mayā kiñcit /
GK16visa03cu:2650: paryaśruṇī tu nayane tasyāḥ kathayāmbabhūvatuḥ sarvam” //
GK16visa03cu:2655: mayā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭetyanvayaḥ sarvamitivirahādhīnaṃ tat tadduḥ khamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2673: tava virahe tava priyā śvāsān muñcatītyādi /
GK16visa03cu:2682: vallabhasya puraḥ proktaṃ maugdhyaṃ tattattvavedibhiḥ // VisSd_3.107 //
GK16visa03cu:2684: ke drumāste kva vā grāme santi kena praropitāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2688: (vi, ca) ajñānādiveti---pratītasyāpi vastunaḥ ajñānādiva yā vallabhasya puraḥ pṛcchā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2715: (vi, ja) prasādhikālambitamiti---indumatyā svayaṃ vṛtasya ajasya purīpraveśe didṛkṣoḥ striyāḥ kriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:2716: prasādhikayā striyā ālambitam agrapādaṃ padāgram dravarāgamaśuṣkālaktakameva kācit
GK16visa03cu:2717: purastrī ākṣipya ākṛṣya utsṛṣṭalīlāgatiḥ tyaktalīlāgatiḥ satī padavīmāgavākṣāt gavākṣaparyyantam
GK16visa03cu:2727: (vi, jha) avasmādeveti---iyaṃ tanvī yat punarakasmādeva jahāsa tena iti pūraṇāduttarārddhānvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2728: svārājyaṃ svargarājatvam iyameva svarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2734: kṣubhyanti prasabhamaho vināpi hetorlīlābhiḥ kimu sati kāraṇo taruṇyaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:2737: (vi, ña) kuto 'pīti---dayitasyāgre kuto 'pi hetoḥ bhayasaṃbhramaḥ vyākulatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2739: vāmorūḥ calaśapharībhirvighaṭṭitorūḥ satī trasyantī vibhramasya vilāsasyātiśayamāpa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2741: aho taruṇyaḥ hetorvināpi līlābhiḥ pratatamatiśayaṃ kṣubhyanti saṃcalanti kāraṇe tu sati kimu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2744: vihāre saha kāntena krīḍitaṃ kolirucyate // VisSd_3.110 //
GK16visa03cu:2750: (vi, ṭa) vyapohitumiti---kācidunnatapīvarastanī unmanāḥ kāmodvignamanāḥ priyamurasi pīvarastanena jaghāna /
GK16visa03cu:2751: kīdṛsaṃ priyam puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ tasyā locanato mukhanilairvyapohitum apākarttum apārayantam /
GK16visa03cu:2754: dṛṣṭavā darśayati vrīṅāṃ sammukhaṃ naiva paśyati /
GK16visa03cu:2755: pracchannaṃ vā bhramantaṃ vātikrāntaṃ paśyati priyam // VisSd_3.111 //
GK16visa03cu:2767: cirāya savidhe sthānaṃ priyasya bahu manyate /
GK16visa03cu:2774: bāhumūlaṃ stanau nābhipaṅkajaṃ darśayet sphuṭam // VisSd_3.115 //
GK16visa03cu:2776: viśvasityasya mitreṣu bahumānaṃ karoti ca // VisSd_3.116 //
GK16visa03cu:2777: sakhīmaghye guṇān brūte svadhanaṃ pradadāti ca /
GK16visa03cu:2780: (vi, ḍha) svadhanaṃ dadāti ca ityatra yācakāya bhatte iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2782: supte svapiti duḥkhe 'sya duḥkhaṃ dhatte sukhe sukham // VisSd_3.117 //
GK16visa03cu:2786: (vi, ṇa) priye dūrataḥ paśyati sati iti śaśvat vāramvāram asya dṛṣṭipathe sthitā bhavatīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2789: priyasya dṛṣṭipathe sthitā tasmin dūrataḥ paśyati sati /
GK16visa03cu:2791: yadi ca priyasya kathāṃ kathayati tadādhomukhī satī kathayati /
GK16visa03cu:2814: daśati svādharaṃ cāpi brūte priyamadhomukhī // VisSd_3.121 //
GK16visa03cu:2815: na muñcati ca taṃ deśaṃ nāyako yatra dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:2820: āgacchati gṛhaṃ tasya kāryavyājena kenacit // VisSd_3.122 //
GK16visa03cu:2823: (vi, na) āgacchati gṛhaṃ tasyeti bhinnagṛhasthitasya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2830: nityaṃ haṣyati tadyoge viyoge malinā kṛśā // VisSd_3.123 //
GK16visa03cu:2831: manyate bahu tacchīlaṃ tatpriyaṃ manyate priyam /
GK16visa03cu:2840: (vi, pha) sammukhaṃ nādhigacchati kintu pārśvasthā eva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2856: hanta harṣe dṛṣṭvāpi iyaṃ priyāntikagatamapi mām alokayantīva apaśyantīva sarasanakhakṣatena lakṣitaṃ cihnitaṃ bhujāmūlaṃ bāhumūlam āviṣkuruta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2862: dūtyaḥ sakhī naṭī dāsī dhātreyī prativeśinī // VisSd_3.128 //
GK16visa03cu:2863: bālā pravrajitā kārūḥ śilpinyādyaḥ svayaṃ tathā /
GK16visa03cu:2870: “panthia piāsio via lacchīasi jāsi tā kimaṇṇatto /
GK16visa03cu:2871: ṇa maṇaṃ vi vārao idha atthi dhare ghaṇarasaṃ piantāṇaṃ” //
GK16visa03cu:2876: pathika / pipāsuriva lakṣyase yāsi tat kimanyatra /
GK16visa03cu:2877: na manāgapi vāraka ihāsti gṛhe ghanarasaṃ pibatām //
GK16visa03cu:2881: ghanarasaṃ sukhena nihitaṃ śṛṅgārarasaṃ pibatām āsvādayatām /
GK16visa03cu:2885: pathika / pipāsuriva lakṣyase yāsi tat kimanyatra /
GK16visa03cu:2886: na manāgapi vāraka ihāsti gṛhe ghanarasaṃ pibatām //
GK16visa03cu:2908: (lo, a) evaṃ saparikaraṃ vibhāvasya ālambanākhyaṃ bhedaṃ nirūpya uddīpanākhyaṃ bhedaṃ nirūpayannāha--athorddāpanetyādi /
GK16visa03cu:2920: (vi, ra) karamudayamahīdhareti---ayaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ amareśasya indrasya diśaḥ prācyāḥ mukhaṃ vicumbati /
GK16visa03cu:2921: kiṃ kṛtvā galitaṃ tamaḥ paṭalarūpam aṃśukaṃ yasmāt tādṛśe udayamahīdhararūpasya stanasyāgre karaṃ raśmimeva karaṃ niveśya /
GK16visa03cu:2922: yadyapyatra candro nāyaka eva na uddīpanavibhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2924: sphuṭamudāharaṇantu--- karpūradhūladhavaladyutipūradhauta-- diṅmaṇḍale śiśirarociṣi tasya yūnaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2927: (lo, ā) karamudayeti-karaṃ kiraṇaṃ hastaśca kumudānām īkṣaṇaṃ darśanaṃ pakṣe kumudameva īkṣaṇaṃ cakṣuryatra /
GK16visa03cu:2930: yo yasya rasamyoddīpanavibhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:2939: svaiḥ svaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ udbuddhaṃ bhāvaṃ ratyādikaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayan ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2943: atheti---udbuddhamiti rāmādervāsanāntarlonasya ratyādibhāvanasya udvodhaṃ bahiḥ prakaṭayannityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2945: yaḥ khalu loke sītādicandrādibhiḥ svaiḥ svairālambanoddīpanakāraṇe rāmāderantarudbuddhaṃ ratyādikaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayan kāryamityucyate,
GK16visa03cu:2949: tadrūpāḥ sāttvikā bhāvāstathā ceṣṭāḥ parā api /
GK16visa03cu:2952: (vi, va) uktāḥ strīṇamiti---aṅgajāḥ svābhāvikāśca ye strīṇāmaṣṭāviṃśatiralaṅkārāḥ
GK16visa03cu:2953: sāttvikā uktāḥ tathā aparā api tāsāṃ puṃsāṃ vā yāḥ ceṣṭāḥ vakṣyamāṇāstāḥ sarvāḥ sāttvikāstadrūpā
GK16visa03cu:2958: tatra yo yasya rasasyānubhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:2967: (lo, ī) kaścanāntaro dharmmaḥ saca paragataduḥ khaharṣādibhāvanāyāmatyantānukūlāntaḥ karaṇatvam /
GK16visa03cu:2973: stambhaḥ svedo 'tha lomāñcaḥ svarabhaṅgo 'tha vepathuḥ // VisSd_3.135 //
GK16visa03cu:2977: (vi, ṣa) te bhinnā iti---loke yaḥ kāryarūpaḥ so 'nubhāva ityanena ratyādeḥ kāryamātrasyaivānubhāvatvabhuktam /
GK16visa03cu:2979: nanu kiṃ tarhi sāttvikena pṛthagupādānamityata āha---gobalīvardeti /
GK16visa03cu:2980: gotvena prāptasyāpi balīvardasyaiva kāryatvena prāptanāmipi sāttvikānāṃ prāśastyārthaṃ pṛthagupādānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2982: tathā aparā api sāttvikā iti yaduktaṃ tān pṛcchati /

GK16visa03cu:3766: eṣāṃ rasānāṃ varṇadaivatakathanaṃ nāṭakādiṣu vidheyāvighnahetukeṣu naṭasaṃpādyapūjādiṣu pratyūhyate /
GK16visa03cu:3780: vipralambho 'tha saṃbhoga ityeṣa dvividho mataḥ // VisSd_3.186 //
GK16visa03cu:3782: yatra tu ratiḥ prakṛṣṭā nābhīṣṭamupaiti vipralambho 'sā /
GK16visa03cu:3789: tena māninyāmanukūlatāyāṃ prāptāyāmapi nāyakasya vipralambha eva /
GK16visa03cu:3791: (lo, ū) yatra tviti---ratiruktaṇṭhā prakṛṣṭā prakṛṣṭatāṃ yātiratiprakarṣasya nāyikāniṣṭatve nāyakaṃ nāyakapakṣe ca nāyikāṃ nopaiti na prāptotītyarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:3797: daśāviśeṣo yo 'prāptau pūrvarāgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_3.188 //
GK16visa03cu:3804: sa ca śravaṇāt darśanāt vā bhavatītyuktatvāt śravaṇadarśanayorupāyamāha---
GK16visa03cu:3807: indrajāle ca citre ca sākṣātsvaṣne ca darśanam // VisSd_3.189 //
GK16visa03cu:3810: (vi, ṭha) śravaṇaṃ tviti---dūtādimukhāt śravaṇam indrajālasvaprābhyāṃ cakṣuṣā vā darśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3814: unmādo 'tha vyādhirjaḍatā mṛtiriti daśātra kāmadaśāḥ // VisSd_3.190 //
GK16visa03cu:3828: tathā ca vyādhijvarāditi yaduktaṃ prāk tadīyādipadagrāhyamidaṃ muktamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:3832: “premārdrāḥ praṇayaspṛśaḥ paricayādudrāḍharāgodayā- stāstā mugdhadṛśo nisargamadhurāśceṣṭā bhaveyurmayi /
GK16visa03cu:3833: yāsvantaḥ karaṇasya bāhyakaraṇavyāpārarodhī kṣaṇā- dāśaṃsāparikalpitāsvapi bhavatyānandasāndro layaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:3837: mukhadṛśo mālatyāstāstāḥ anyādṛśaḥ ceṣṭā mayi bhaveyuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3843: yāsu ceṣṭāsu āśaṃsāyāmicchāyāṃ parikalpitāsvapi antaḥ karaṇasya ānandena sāndro vyāpto layaḥ līnatā kṣaṇādbhavati /
GK16visa03cu:3848: (lo, ṛ) premārdrā iti---darśanādigato bhāvavyañjakaḥ kaścana cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ prema tatpūrvako vaśīkāraḥ praṇayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3854: iti cintākulaḥ kānto nidrāṃ naiti niśīthinīm” //
GK16visa03cu:3869: “tribhāgaśeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣamaṃ nimīlya netre sahasā vyabudhyana /
GK16visa03cu:3875: pārvatīsakhyā vijayāyā jaṭilaveśapracchannaṃ maheśa prati uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3876: bhāgatraye jāgaritatvāt śeṣāvaśiṣṭāsu niśāsu netre nimīlya mīlayitvā iyaṃ sahasā vyabudhyata /
GK16visa03cu:3877: kīdṛśī asatye harasya kaṇṭhe 'rpitabāhubandhanā satī he nīlakaṇṭha /
GK16visa03cu:3882: “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3885: (lo, ṝ) pāṇiḍvati---parakṣetre na chedanīyo rogaḥ kṣetriyarogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3890: (vi, da) pāṇḍukṣāmāmiti---mālatyāṃ tadvirahāvasthāṃ pṛcchantyā lavaṅgikāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3891: he sakhi / tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre acikitsyaṃ rogaṃ pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ karttṛ āvedayatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3896: dīho ṇīsāsaharo eso sāhei jīaitti paraṃ” //
GK16visa03cu:3900: dīrgho niḥ śvāsabhara eṣa sādhayati jīvatīti param /
GK16visa03cu:3903: ato dīrghaniśvāsa eva iyaṃ jīvati sādhayati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3912: (vi, na) cetasākāṅkṣitamiti---maraṇākāṅkṣā eva varṇanīyā na maraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3917: “śephālikāṃ vidalitāmavalokya tanvī prāṇān kathaṃcidapi dhārayituṃ prabhūtā /
GK16visa03cu:3918: ākarṇya saṃprati rutaṃ caraṇāyudhānāṃ kiṃ vā bhaviṣyati na vedmi tapasvinī sā” //
GK16visa03cu:3921: (vi, pa) śephālikāmiti---vidalitāṃ patitakusumāṃ kiñcidavaśiṣṭāyāṃ rātrau tadvidalanāt,
GK16visa03cu:3924: prātaḥ kāla eveti tatra maraṇasaṃbhāvanayā sakhyā viṣādoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3927: (lo, ḷ) śephālikāmiti---śephālikāvidalanena niśīthakālaḥ sūcitaḥ tapasvinī śocyā /
GK16visa03cu:3930: “rolambāḥ paripūrayantu harito jhaṃkārakolāhalair mandaṃ mandamupaitu candanavanījāto nabhasvānapi /
GK16visa03cu:3931: mādyantaḥ kalayantu cūtaśikhare kelīpikāḥ pañcamaṃ prāṇāḥ satvaramaśmasārakaṭhinā gacchantu gacchantvamī” //
GK16visa03cu:3954: eṣa ca prakāraḥ karuṇaḥ vipralambhaviṣaya iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3963: unmādo mūrcchā mṛtirityetāḥ smaradaśā daśaiva syu” /
GK16visa03cu:3966: ādau vācyaḥ striyā rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ paścāttadiṅgitaiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3980: nīlī kusumbhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā pūrvarāgo 'pi ca tridhā // VisSd_3.195 //
GK16visa03cu:3992: (vi, ma) na cātiśobhate iti---avispaṣṭatvāt na cātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3993: śrīrāmasītayoriti---śrīrāmasya dhīrodāttatvāt purūvasa ivātyantapralāpābhāvena nātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3996: mānaḥ kopaḥ sa tu dvedhā praṇayerṣyāsamudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4000: praṇayena īrṣyayā vā samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4002: dvayoḥ praṇayamānaḥ syāt pramode sumahatyapi // VisSd_3.198 //
GK16visa03cu:4003: premṇaḥ kuṭilagāmitvāt kopo yaḥ kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GK16visa03cu:4004: dvayoriti nāyakasya nāyikāyāśca ubhayośca praṇayamāno varṇanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4016: praṇayamānena alīkaprasuptaṃ nāyakaṃ cumbitvā tenāślādhitāyā nāyikāyāstaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4020: mayā te tava gaṇḍaparicumbanayā pulakitamarthāt tavāṅgameva mamāvakāśo mama sthityavakāśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4023: atra ca“prāgāmantritamasakṛdi“ti sūtreṇa te ityasya asambhavo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4036: etaccirāyitāyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ sakalāmapi śayyāmāvṛtya mithyāprasuptasya nāyakasya gaṇḍaṃ paricumbya tasyā vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:4042: atra pārvatīṃ tyaktvā sandhyāvandanāya gate maheśe pārvatyā māne tasya tadbhaṅgapravṛttau tatra hi “sandhyayā kamalayonikanyayā yā tanuḥ sutanu
GK16visa03cu:4060: atra ko mallaḥ kaściraṃ soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ na jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4070: “bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi dṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate ruddhāyāmapi vāci sammitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:4071: kārkaśyaṃ gamite 'pi cetasi tanū romāñcamālambate dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane” //
GK16visa03cu:4074: (vi, ṣa) mayā bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi mama dṛṣṭistaṃ priyaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate /
GK16visa03cu:4075: ityādirītyā tasmin jane priyatame dṛṣṭe sati kathaṃ mānasya nirvahaṇaṃ nirvāho bhaviṣyatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4079: “ekasmiñśayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16visa03cu:4097: tvaṃ kiṃ brūṣe na bhavati madanyatra nirataḥ patirme dhūrtto 'sāvṛjurasi na jānāsi tamimam /
GK16visa03cu:4098: samudratyāgārādaparayuvatīsaṅganirato mayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tadalamiha saṃprītikathayā //
GK16visa03cu:4109: (vi, ha) navanakheti---anyanāyikāsaṅgacihnakhapadādimaṃśukādinā yadyapi gopāyituṃ śaknoṣi tathāpi vimardetthāṅgarāgagandhaḥ kena prakāreṇa vārayituṃ śakya iti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4112: gotraskhalite yathā---“ekasmin śayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥ kopaparāṅmukhaṃ śayitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi /
GK16visa03cu:4113: āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamaḥ tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ tat kṣaṇād mābhūt supta ivetyamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvokṣitaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4116: mama sa yat cāṭu kurute samasto 'sau vyājapraṇaya iti jānīhi niyatam /
GK16visa03cu:4117: tadā tāṃ tu dhyāyan sa khalu kitavaḥ kelisamaye muhustasya nāmnā nanu rahasi sambodhayati mām //
GK16visa03cu:4120: sāma bhedo 'tha dānaṃ ca natyupekṣe rasāntaram /
GK16visa03cu:4121: tadbhaṅgāya patiḥ kuryāt ṣaḍupāyāniti kramāt // VisSd_3.201 //
GK16visa03cu:4123: dānaṃ vyājena bhūṣādeḥ pādayoḥ patanaṃ natiḥ // VisSd_3.202 //
GK16visa03cu:4153: gacchannityatra upekṣā etāḥ pañca sūcitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4154: ebhirupāyairasya mānabhaṅgābhāve 'pi na tadupāyahīniḥ tasyāmajātodvegarūpasahakāriviraheṇa phalānutpādanāt /
GK16visa03cu:4156: rasāntarantūhyamiti--harṣād yathā---“cirapravāsāt suhṛdi prayāte yastatra harṣo mithunasya jātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4160: bhayād yathā---“pravṛtte mānabhaṅgāya patyau nāga upāgataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4161: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā kaṇṭhe patiṃ jagrāha māninī //
GK16visa03cu:4171: (vi, kha) vipralambhasya pūrvarāgamānapravāsakaruṇarūpacāturvidhyasya uktatvāt pūrvarāgaṃ mānñca samāpya pravāsamāha---atha pravāsa iti /
GK16visa03cu:4176: mṛtiśceti kramājjñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha // VisSd_3.206 //
GK16visa03cu:4196: patyau pravāsasthe karatale gaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā cintayantīṃ prati kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4198: bhāvī bhavanbhūta iti tridhā syāttatra kāryajaḥ // VisSd_3.208 //
GK16visa03cu:4203: (vi, ṅa) pravāsasya kāryyāt śāpāt ityādi traividhyasyoktatvāt kāryyajameva trividhamāha--bhāvīti /
GK16visa03cu:4211: śokaste gamane kuto mama tato vāṣpaṃ kathaṃ muñcasi /
GK16visa03cu:4212: śīghraṃ na vrajasīti māṃ gamayituṃ kasmādiyaṃ te tvarā,
GK16visa03cu:4213: bhūyānasya saha tvayā jigamiṣorjovasya me saṃbhramaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4226: tvayā saha jigamiṣoḥ asya me jīvasya bhūyān saṃbhramastvaretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4229: tava gamane mama kutaḥ śokaḥ jīvanābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4233: mayi kṛtakapremakavastaba na khalu kadācid gamanam /
GK16visa03cu:4236: gamane hasasotpanne eṣāmapi niryāṇa ākulībhāvo nivarttatāmiti /
GK16visa03cu:4243: yātuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā gantavye sati jīvita /
GK16visa03cu:4249: he jīvita / priyatame yātuṃ niścitacetasi sati tavāpi gantavye gatatve sati valayādipriyasuhṛtsārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4253: prasthānaṃ yātrā bahudinavyāpakatadvārttayā kārśyena valayabhraṃśaḥ gataṃ calitam /
GK16visa03cu:4255: tacca maraṇahetuśokādiduḥ khe 'pyaśrupātena tadduḥ khasya kiñcidupaśamāt /
GK16visa03cu:4264: atra pūrvarāgoktānāmabhilāṣādīnāmatroktānāṃ cāṅgāsauṣṭhavādīnāmapi daśānānubhayeṣāmapyubhayatra sambhave 'pi cirantanaprasiddhyā vivicya pratipādanam
GK16visa03cu:4271: tatra ca devena urvaśyā haraṇameva daiva utpātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4280: tathā ca tatra vipralambha eva ityuktvā prathamaṃ karuṇaḥ paścāttu vipralambha ityabhiyuktānāṃ mataṃ darśayitumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4282: yathā pūrvarāgamānapravāsarūpā viśeṣāstathā maraṇasyāpi viśeṣasya sambhavādetadbhedena pravāsabhinnamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4286: etadgranthakṛtaḥ kuvalayāśvacarite ca yuvatermadālasāyastathābhāve kuvalayāśvasya śarīrāntareṇa labhye ajendumatīvṛttāntavat /
GK16visa03cu:4289: punaralabhye śarīrāntareṇa bālabhye tu karuṇākhya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4294: yaccātra “saṅgamapratyāśānantaramapi bhavato vipralambhaśṛṅgārasya pravāsākhyo bheda eva” iti kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4298: ayamāśayaḥ---yathā bhavadbhirekadeśasthayorviyogo virahākhyaḥ videśasthayoḥ pravāsākhya iti īṣadbhinnadharmayoge 'pi bhedaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4300: śarīrāntare tu karuṇa iti bahutarabhinnayoge iti kā kṣatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4301: yattu kaiścid abhilāṣapravāserṣyāvirahaśāpahetukatvena pañcadhā vipralambhaityuktam tatra saṅgamaprāgabhāvarūpo 'bhilāṣaḥ pūrvarāga eva /
GK16visa03cu:4304: yadā tu paroḍhāviṣayaḥ tadā rasābhāvasattvāt na śṛṅgararasabhedaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4307: atra eva maharṣiṇā pravāsadaśadaśālakṣaṇe“pūrvānubhava jā jñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha“iti pūrvānubhavatvamuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4312: yadi caikadeśasthayorna pravāsastat kathaya kiyati yojane kiyati vā kośe 'sau maharṣibhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4314: purvaṃrāgastayā cakavākayostṛṇamātravyavadhāne 'pi śāpravāsā khyaśṛṅgārābhāsa iti sarvaṃ sustham /
GK16visa03cu:4329: kadācit ekaikena kadācittūbhayena nāpi darśanādikaṃ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4330: tena ekaikasya darśanādau api sambhogo boddhyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4334: digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4339: ayameka eva dhīraiḥ kathitaḥ saṃbhogaśṛṅgāraḥ // VisSd_3.211 //
GK16visa03cu:4344: “yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ śṛṅgāreṇopamīyate (upayujyate ca)” iti /
GK16visa03cu:4348: medhyaṃ pavitram anyad vā yat taduddīpanavibhāvarūpatayā vācyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4350: śṛṅgāreṇa hetunā upamīyate taduddīpanatayā upamīyate upasthāpyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4362: kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyān rāgo vivardhate” //
GK16visa03cu:4364: tatra pūrvarāgānantaraṃ saṃbhogo yathā kumārasambhave pārvatīparameśvarayoḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4367: (vi, ṭha) sambhogaśṛṅgārasya evavidhatvamuktvā pūrvarāgādyānantaryeṇa tasya cāturvidhyaṃ vaktumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4376: etādṛkkṛśatā kutaḥ tuha puṇo puṭṭhaṃ sarīraṃ jado /
GK16visa03cu:4380: na kapi me, jai idaṃ khemaṃ kudo pucchasi” //
GK16visa03cu:4385: jai iti--- yadi idaṃ kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4386: ayamarthaḥ---yadāhameva praṇayinī kimiti māṃ parihṛtya dūraṃ gato 'si yaddhetukastavāyaṃ praśraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4388: saṃyogaviyogau ca parasparāyattatārūpau tena dūtipraṣaṇādeḥ saṃbhogaviṣayatvam /
GK16visa03cu:4394: (vi, ḍa) kṣemaṃ te nanu ityādi---ime dampatyoruktipratyuktī /
GK16visa03cu:4401: puṭṭhamiti---tava punaḥ śarīraṃ puṣṭaṃ yata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4402: paṇaiṇīti---praṇayinyā mama dehasya saṃbhiśraṇāt saṃkocāt kṛśīkaraṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4405: ato māṃ kṛśāṃ kṛtvā manmāsena tava śarīraṃ puṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4407: he subhru / tvattaḥ kāpi na me kāpi puṣṭiḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4408: jai idamiti yadīdaṃ tadā kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4410: matkārśye 'pi tava paṣṭyā ca mayi tavānurāgābhāvenaiva puṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4411: anurāgasattve tu madvirahāt kārśyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4413: tatra ca maraṇānantaraṃ jīvane mahāśvetāpuṇḍarīkayoḥ sambhoge /
GK16visa03cu:4427: smitahasita iti---kasyāciduttamanāyakasya smitaṃ kasyacittu hasitam ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4430: (lo, ai) hāsya iti---vikṛtād vikiyāyuktāda vāgveśaceṣṭādeḥ kuhakākhyavañcanāprayogācca hāsyaraso bhavediti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4436: kiñcillakṣyadvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visa03cu:4438: apahasitaṃ sāstrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavatyatihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visa03cu:4452: kāyocchvasanadṛṣṭisaṅkocādayo harṣāvahitthādayaśca anubhāvavyabhicāriṇaḥ anuktā api sāmarthyāllabhyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4456: yasya hāsaḥ sa ceta kvāpi sākṣānnaiva nibadhyate /
GK16visa03cu:4462: (vi, ta) atra cottamādiṣu ya upahāsakastasya smitādikamunneyam /
GK16visa03cu:4465: abhedeneti---sa upahāsakaḥ sāmājikaiḥ vibhāvādisādhāraṇyāt yataḥ abhedena pratīyate tato hāsyaraso 'yamanumīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4470: tataśca svādanākhyena vyāpāreṇa hāsyarasa āsvādyata iti pūrvāparagranthaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4485: “vipine kva jaṭānibandhanaṃ tava cedaṃ kva manoharaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4486: anayorghaṭanā vidheḥ sphuṭaṃ nanu khaḍgena śirīṣakarttanam” //
GK16visa03cu:4494: tatra bandhuviyoge yathā---“hā mātastvaritāsi kutra kimidaṃ hā devatāḥ kvāśiṣaḥ dhik prāṇān patito 'śanirhutavahaste 'ṅgeṣu dagdhe dṛśau /
GK16visa03cu:4495: itthaṃ ghargharamadhyaruddhakaruṇāpaurāṅganānāṃ giraḥ citrasthānapi rodayanti śatadhā kurvanti bhittīrapi //
GK16visa03cu:4496: “idaṃ madālasāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ purastrīṇāṃ rodanasya kenāpi kathanam /
GK16visa03cu:4497: vittanāśe yathā-“kiṃ karomi kka gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kka vrajāmyaham /
GK16visa03cu:4503: vipralambhe ratiḥ sthāyī punaḥ saṃbhogahetukaḥ // VisSd_3.226 //
GK16visa03cu:4524: narakaripuṇā sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ sabhīmakirīṭinā- mayamahamasṛṅmedomāṃsaiḥ karomi diśāṃ balim” //
GK16visa03cu:4529: idaṃ svayaṃ mṛtasya mama pituḥ śiracchedarūpaṃ gurupātakaṃ yairudāyudhairmanujapaśubhirnirmayādairbhavaddhiḥ
GK16visa03cu:4530: kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā narakāsurasya ripuṇā śrīkṛṣṇena sārddhaṃ sabhīmakirīṭināṃ
GK16visa03cu:4531: teṣāṃ medomāṃsaiḥ diśāṃ diksthitabhūtānāṃ balimayamaham etatkṣaṇavartto ahaṃ karomītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4534: narakaripupadopādānāt narakahetupātakahantāraṃ gurupātakakāriṇañca haniṣyāmīti sūcanāt matkrodhe jagadeva naṅkṣyati iti sūcitam /
GK16visa03cu:4553: sa ca dānadarmayuddhairdayayā ca samanvitaścaturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.234 //
GK16visa03cu:4554: sa ca vīro dānavīro dharmavīro yuddhavīro dayāvīraśceti caturvidhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4560: harṣadhṛtyādibhaiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nīto dānavīratāṃ bhajate /
GK16visa03cu:4563: (vi, pa) tyāgaḥ saptasamudreti---saptasamudrāvṛttayā mahyā nirvyājadānaparyyantaḥ tyāga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4568: “rājyaṃ ca vasu dehaśca bhāryā bhrātṛsutāśca ye /
GK16visa03cu:4569: yacca loke mamāyattaṃ tad dharmāya sadodyatam” //
GK16visa03cu:4572: dīyatāṃ janakajā rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācate ko 'yaṃ te mativibhramaḥ smara nayaṃ nādyāpi kiṃcidratam /
GK16visa03cu:4573: naivaṃ cet kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ kaṇṭhāsṛjā paṅkilaḥ pattrī naiṣa sahiṣyate mama dhanurjyābandhabandhūkṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4577: rāmo rāmanāmnā khyāto vālihantā svayaṃ yācate /
GK16visa03cu:4580: mayā saha sandherupāyaḥ ko 'pi na gata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4581: naivaṃ cet sītā na dīyate cet tadā mama dhanuḥ jyābandhasya bandhūkṛta eṣa patrī vāṇo na sahiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:4585: “śirāmukhaiḥ syandata eva raktamadyāpi dehe mama māṃsamasti /
GK16visa03cu:4586: tṛptiṃ na paśyāmi tavāpi tāvat kiṃ bhakṣaṇāttvaṃ virato garutman / /
GK16visa03cu:4591: garuḍena bhakṣyamāṇaṃ nāgaṃ paritrātuṃ tadbhakṣaṇāya ātmadehamarpitavatastadbhakṣitabahumāṃsasya jīmūtavāhanasyātṛptaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4594: atra hetumāha---mama kīdṛśasya śirāmukheṃ raktaṃ syandata eva /
GK16visa03cu:4595: ato yadyapi bahūni māṃsāni bhakṣitāni tathāpi tṛptimātmani na paśyāmi /
GK16visa03cu:4607: (vi, bha) bhayānakānubhāveṣu pulakaḥ kiñcid aṅgeṣu romāñcaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4624: ārttaḥ paryastanetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretaraṅkaḥ karaṅkādaṅkasthādasthiṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamadhyagramatti” //
GK16visa03cu:4629: utkṛtyeti---karālārādhanāya gatasya mādhavasya śavaṃ bhuñjānaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4632: aṅkasthāt śavāt asthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyaṃmāṃsaṃ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ sannavyagraṃ yathā syāttathātti /
GK16visa03cu:4633: kiṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ kṛttiṃ carmma utkṛtyokṛtya /
GK16visa03cu:4634: athānantaraṃ aṃse bhujamūle sphici nitambe pṛṣṭe ca /
GK16visa03cu:4638: māṃsāni kīdṛśāni pṛthunā ucchothena tatphullatayā bhūyāṃsi bahūni tathā atidurgandhīni /
GK16visa03cu:4649: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaveduddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visa03cu:4662: dordaṇḍeti--rāmeṇa dhanuṣi bhagne tacchabdaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4663: dordaṇḍenāñcitasya utkṣiptasya candraśekharadhanurdaṇḍasyāvabhaṅgena udgato jhaṅkāradhvaniḥ aho 'dyāpi na viśrāmyati /
GK16visa03cu:4665: āryyasya rāmasya bālacaritānāṃ prastāvanāyāḥ prakhyāpanāyāḥ ḍiṇḍimo vādyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4667: brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍasya caṇḍaśabdāt utphulya punarmilitaṃ brahmāṇḍakapāladvayaṃ tadudare
GK16visa03cu:4675: evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā milati jāyamāne brahmaṇḍabhāṇḍodare bhrāmyan piṇḍitaḥ piṇḍībhūtaḥ caṇḍimā caṇḍatvaṃ yasyeti jhaṅkāradhvanorviśeṣaṇam
GK16visa03cu:4688: (vi, ra) anityatvādinā ityatra ādipadāt iṣṭaviyogādinā vairāgyaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4696: “rathyāntaścaratastathā dhṛtajarat kanthālavasyādhvagaiḥ satrāsaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca sadayaṃ dṛṣṭasya tairnāgaraiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4697: nirvyājīkṛtacitsudhārasamudā nidrāyamāṇasya me niḥśaṅkaḥ karaṭaḥ kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ viluṇṭhiṣyati” //
GK16visa03cu:4702: nirbojīkṛtayā citsudhārasamudā jñānāmṛtaharṣeṇa nidrāyamāṇasya me kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ karaṭaḥ kāko viluṇṭhiṣyati /
GK16visa03cu:4705: bhikṣāviluṇṭhanādibhayābhāvāt niḥ śaṅkaṃ carataḥ rathyāntaḥ nagararājamārgamadhye carataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4707: ataḥ taiḥ rathyāsthaiḥ adhvagairnāgaraiḥ kanthādiviparītadarśanāt satrāsañca sakautukañca daridrāvasthādarśanāt sadayañca dṛṣṭasya /
GK16visa03cu:4716: nirbojīkṛto yo 'sau citjñānameva sudhārasaḥ tena prakāśena yā mut prītiḥ sukhaikamayatā tayā nidrāyamāṇasya paśyato 'pi prameyajātamapaśyataḥ citsudhārasasya /
GK16visa03cu:4717: nirbojīkṛtasyāyamarthaḥ-- nirgataṃ bījaṃ saṃsārakāraṇam avidyākhyaṃ yasmāt prakāśādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4718: nirgataṃ bījam ātmaprakāśajñānakāraṇaṃ mano yatra sa nirbojaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4724: dayāvīrādau hi nāgānandadau jīmūtavāhanāderantarā malayavatyādyanurāgāderante ca vidyādharacakravatitvādyāpterdarśanādahaṅkāropaśamo na dṛśyate
GK16visa03cu:4728: “na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na cintā na dveṣarāgau na ca kacidicchā /
GK16visa03cu:4729: rasaḥ sa śāntaḥ kathito manīndraiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu samapramāṇaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4733: nāgānandeti---jīmūtavāhananāyake nāgānande nāṭake kāvyaprakāśe śāntasya jīmūtavāhanasya yuktimākṣipatiataśca iti /
GK16visa03cu:4735: atra ca iti---mokṣāvasthīyaśāntaḥ sa evayato rasatāmetīti kāvyanāṭyasamarpitaḥ sanniti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4739: sarveṣu loṣṭrāśmakāñcanādiṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu gamaṃ tulyaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñānaṃ yatra /
GK16visa03cu:4741: ityevaṃrūpasya śāntasya mokṣāvasthāyāmevātmasvarūpāpattilakṣaṇāyāṃ prādurbhāvāttatra sañcāryādīnāmabhāvāt kathaṃ rasatvamityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:4743: (lo, ū) ātmeti---ātmasvarūpasya āpattiḥ prāptiḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4745: yuktaviyuktadaśāyāmavasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4746: rasatāmeti tadasmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiśca na viruddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visa03cu:4753: tena śāntasya vaiṣayikasukhabhinnaṃ tṛṣṇākṣayādhīnaṃ sukhamastyeva ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4755: (lo, ṛ) yukteti---tatra viṣayebhyaḥ parāvṛtya sākṣāt kartavye brahmaṇi mano nidhāya varttamānatvacintāsantānavān yuktaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4758: yaśca bhūtvendriyajayī aṇimādyaḥ kāyasiddhīrdūraśraṇādyā hyatīndriyāṇi sve sve viṣaye sahattvasannikarṣādisahakāranirapekṣāṇi varttante,
GK16visa03cu:4774: kadā vārāṇasyāmiha suradhunīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno 'ñjalipuṭam /
GK16visa03cu:4783: kadā vārāṇasyāmiti--iha vārāṇasyāṃ suradhunyā gaṅgāyā rodhasi tīre pulin vā vasan
GK16visa03cu:4784: ahaṃ kaupīnadvayañca vasānaḥ śirasyañjalipuṭaṃ dadhānaśca aye gaurīnāthetyādinā'krośan
GK16visa03cu:4786: atra kaupīnādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sukhādirāhityaprāptyā sarvāhaṅkārarāhityalābhād devaviṣayaraterapi śāntarasatvaprāptiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4789: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4793: (vi, ha) vatsalatāsneha iti---na caivaṃ dayāvīratvaprasaktiriti vācyam ,
GK16visa03cu:4794: ātmāpakāreṇāpi paropacikīrṣāprayojakadharmaviśeṣasya dayātvāt sukhasambandhini anurāgaviśeṣasya ca snehatvāt iti anayorbhedāt /
GK16visa03cu:4807: “yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgalīm /
GK16visa03cu:4808: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna sor'bhakaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4811: (vi, kṣa) yadāha dhātryeti---uditasya uccāritasya prathamaṃ prathamoditamiti“rājadantādisamāsāt” /
GK16visa03cu:4812: dātryā uditaśca nārāyaṇetyādiśabdaśca prathamaṃ“nā“ityādi yadvacaḥ raghurāha tadīyāṃ dhātrīyām aṅgulimavalambya yacca yayau praṇipātaśikṣayā yacca namno 'bhūt,
GK16visa03cu:4813: tena karmaṇā piturdilīpasya mudaṃ tatāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4820: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīrarasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visa03cu:4827: unmādādirna tu sthāyī na pātre syairyameti yat /
GK16visa03cu:4832: (lo, e) nanūnmādānāṃ sthāyitvamavalambya kathamanye 'pi rasā noktāḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--kuto 'pīti /
GK16visa03cu:4842: rasanādrasā iti---rasanam āsvādanaṃ tadrūpasādṛśyāt gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā rasapadārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4845: (lo, ai) nanu yadi rasātmakaṃ vākyameva kāvyaṃ tāha bhāvādipradhānamakāvya syādityaśaṅkyāha---rasābhāvāditi /
GK16visa03cu:4860: sthāyī sthāyibhāvavad vācyo natu sthiratāmāpanna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4863: tathā ca dhvanireva rasa ityataḥ kathaṃ tatra bhāvadhvanitvamityata āha---na bhāvo raseti /
GK16visa03cu:4866: tatra yathāpradhānatayā rasastiṣṭhati evaṃ rase 'pi apradhānatayā bhāvastiṣṭhatītyāha---na bhāvahīna iti /
GK16visa03cu:4868: ityuktadiśā paramālocanayā paramaviśrāntisthānena rasena sahaiva vartamānā api rājānugatavivāhapravṛttabhṛtyavadāpātato
GK16visa03cu:4869: yatra pradhānyenābhivyaktā vyabhicāriṇo devamunigurunṛpādivaṣayā ca ratirudbuddhamātrā
GK16visa03cu:4876: evaṃ pradhānamapi raso nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyasya bhāvasya pradhānasya anuga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4877: udvuddhamātrā ityādikaṃ sthāyino bhāvā ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4894: “divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka / prakāmam /
GK16visa03cu:4898: (vi, ca) divi vā bhuvi veti---he narakāsurāntaka maraṇe jāte mama divi bhuvi vā narake vā vāso 'stu /
GK16visa03cu:4901: tadā ca divi vā ityādikam asambaddhaṃ syāt /
GK16visa03cu:4909: tathāpi śuśraṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena tṛpyate” //
GK16visa03cu:4914: he mune tava amunā vilokanenaiva kṛtārthaḥ kato 'smi /
GK16visa03cu:4916: nabarhitaṃ nāśitam aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ yena tādṛśena /
GK16visa03cu:4917: tathāpi tava garīyasīḥ giraḥ śuśrūṣuḥ śrotu micthurammi /
GK16visa03cu:4924: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4928: tava vājirājyā nirdhūtaṃ yad dhūlipaṭalaṃ tena paṅkilām /
GK16visa03cu:4943: kandarpeṇa dhanuṣi āropite ākālike vasante jāte tapasyato maheśasya pārvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid dhairyyaparāvṛttivarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:4946: dhairyyaparāvṛtteḥ kiñcid udbhāvena rasatāmanāptatvena bhāvatvasyaiva prāpterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4948: (lo, o) ratirityanantaraṃ paripoṣaṃ na nīteti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4954: (vi, ña) saṃcāriṇaḥ pradhānāni ityanena pradhānībhūtasyaiva vyabhicāribhāvasya bhāvatvaprāptiruktā /
GK16visa03cu:4974: anaucityaṃ cātra rasānāṃ bhāratādipraṇītalakṣaṇānāṃ sāmagrīrahitatve ekadeśayogitvopalakṣaṇaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4983: tallakṣaṇākteṃ yat kiñcid sattve ekadeśayogitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5014: evamuttarottaraṃ gataparaṃ kvacit tadviṣayaparaṃ kvacit tadviśiṣṭaparaṃ yogyatayā bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:5017: “svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanamidaṃ bālāhamekākinī kṣoṇīmāvṛṇute tamālamalinacchāyā tamaḥ santatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5020: sahasā vartmeti gopyā giraḥ śrutvā tāṃ parirabhya manmathakalāsakto hariḥ pātu vaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:5023: (vi, ḍha) sandhyākāle panthānamāvṛtya tiṣṭhantaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ prati gopyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:5027: tathā hi mugdhataro mūḍhataro mama tava āsaṅgaṃ tarkayitumasamarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5030: tatra gurupatnīgatatve yathā--- madhau prabhūte pikanādadūte mandāniloddhūtavikāśicūte /
GK16visa03cu:5032: munipatnīgatatve yathā--- tapovibhāvasaṃbhavātulavibhūtikaḥ saubhari- rmunirnṛpatikanyakāśataparigrahaḥ kāmataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5033: pracumbati muhurmuhuḥ kucanipīḍamāliṅgati smitottaramudīkṣate parihasatyajastraṃ priyām //
GK16visa03cu:5036: iha hi svāmīti mughdhatara iti ca padābhyāṃ bhayadatvaṃ pakṣe priyatvābhāvo ratināgaratvābhāvaśca,
GK16visa03cu:5039: yauvanena yauvanena ca etādṛśi vayasi anurūpapatirnāsti,
GK16visa03cu:5046: “kāntāsta eva bhuvanatritaye 'pi manye yeṣāṃ kṛte sutanu /
GK16visa03cu:5062: avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā svakacānutkacayāñcakāra bhartrā” //
GK16visa03cu:5065: (vi, ta) jaghanasthaleti---kāpi bhillī kirātī jaghanasthale naddhā dhṛtā patravalliḥ patralatā yathā sā tathā /
GK16visa03cu:5066: girimallīkusumāni kuṭajapuṣpāṇi avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā satī bhartrā svaprayojyena svakacān arthādavacitakusumaiḥ utkacayāñcakāra uddīptāṃścakāretyarthaḥ
GK16visa03cu:5068: atra ca valli ityatra hrasvāntavalliśabdasya rūpam /
GK16visa03cu:5080: cañcadvipañcīkalanādabhaṅgīsaṅgītaṃ cañcantyā vipañcyā vīṇāyāḥ kalanādabhaṅgyā saṅgītam /
GK16visa03cu:5084: “raktotphullaviśālalolanayanaḥ kampottarāṅgo muhur- muktvā karṇamapetabhīrdhṛ tadhanurbāṇo hareḥ paśyataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5085: ādhmātaḥ kaṭukoktibhiḥ svamasakṛddovikramaṃ kīrtaya- nnaṃsāsphoṭapaṭuryudhiṣṭhiramasau intuṃ praviṣṭor'junaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:5089: atra ca tāpasasya jīmūtavāhanasya nṛpasya malayavatyāṃ ratau bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:5091: karṇāt prāptāpamānasya yudhiṣṭhirasya kaṭukoktibhirādhmātaḥ kupitor'junaḥ yudhyamānaṃ karṇaṃ tyaktvā yudhiṣṭhiraṃ hantuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5092: apetabhīrguruhananabhayarahito hareḥ kṛṣṇasya paśyataḥ iti---paśyantaṃ harimanādṛtya ityatrānādare ṣaṣṭhī /
GK16visa03cu:5096: hīnaniṣṭhe śānte gurvādyālambane hāsye brahmavadhādyutsāhe 'dhamapātragate vīre ca nodāhṛtam /
GK16visa03cu:5097: krameṇa yathā caṇḍālayonāviha janma labdhaṃ dvijātijanmāpi na kāṅkṣitaṃ me /
GK16visa03cu:5098: puṇye vane kkāpi vapurvihāsyan punarbhavacchedamahaṃ samīhe // 1 //
GK16visa03cu:5100: adhyāpayatveṣa guruḥ sadā me lālāktavaktro maladigdhavāsāḥ // 2 //
GK16visa03cu:5103: naredraputrān mṛgayā pravṛttān viddhaṃ mṛgaṃ netumupāttavegāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5104: amī kirātāḥ śarapūrṇacāpā dhāvanti matvā tṛṇavattameva // 4 //
GK16visa03cu:5111: (vi, dha) aśaknuvanniti---kauśiko vāsavo yasyāsurasya sahastraśmeriva darśana soḍhumaśaknuvan bibhyat hemādriguhāṃ praviśya dināni nināya /
GK16visa03cu:5114: tathā hi kauśikaḥ pecakaḥ sahastraraśmerdarśanaṃ soḍhumaśaknuvan adriguhāṃ praviśya yathā dināni nayati,
GK16visa03cu:5116: tathā ca pecaka iva indra ityupamādhvaniḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5120: atra śloke bhayasya sthāyibhāvasya bibhyadiyetadvācyatvāt vyaṅgyatvameva nāsti,
GK16visa03cu:5123: tadudāharaṇaṃ tu jātiduṣṭo 'pi saṃślāghyaḥ sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5128: bhāvābhāso lajjādike tu veśyādiviṣaye syāt // VisSd_3.266 //
GK16visa03cu:5132: veśyādiniṣṭhe yathā--- līlānamramukhī śiroṃ'śukamavākṛṣyānayantī puro netropāntavilokanena parito yūnāṃ dhayantī manaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5134: kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ puṇyaughaṃ paripākamāśamayituṃ līlottaraṃ gacchati //
GK16visa03cu:5147: bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ saṃdhiḥ śabalatā matā // VisSd_3.267 //
GK16visa03cu:5149: “sutanu / jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃvidho 'bhūt /
GK16visa03cu:5150: iti nigadati nāthe tiryagāmīlitākṣyā nayanajalamanalpaṃ muktamuktaṃ na kiñcit” //
GK16visa03cu:5153: vrajati ramaṇo niḥ śvasyoccau stanasthitahastayā nayanasalilacchannā dṛṣṭiḥ sakhīṣu niveśitā” //
GK16visa03cu:5163: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti came” //
GK16visa03cu:5174: (vi, ba) kvākāryyamiti---urvaśīvirahe maraṇe pravṛtya nivṛttasya purūravasa uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:5187: iti sāhityadarpaṇe rasādinirūpaṇo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
